titleStmt.title: The second part of The nights search, discovering the condition of the various fowles of night, or, The second great mystery of iniquity exactly revealed with the projects of these times : in a poem / by Humphrey Mill, author of The nights search.

titleStmt.author: Mill, Humphrey, fl. 1646.
